bible_in_eng: Have no cares; but in everything with prayer and praise put your requests before God.And the peace of God, which is deeper than all knowledge, will keep your hearts and minds in Christ Jesus.
bible_in_chinese: 應當一無掛慮，只要凡事藉著禱告、祈求，和感謝，將你們所要的告訴神。神所賜、出人意外的平安必在基督耶穌裡保守你們的心懷意念。

bible_in_eng: May peace be with you; my peace I give to you: I give it not as the world gives. Let not your heart be troubled; let it be without fear.
bible_in_chinese: 我留下平安給你們；我將我的平安賜給你們。我所賜的，不像世人所賜的。你們心裡不要憂愁，也不要膽怯。

bible_in_eng: Come to me, all you who are troubled and weighted down with care, and I will give you rest.
bible_in_chinese: 凡勞苦擔重擔的人可以到我這裡來，我就使你們得安息。

bible_in_eng: The Lord takes care of me as his sheep; I will not be without any good thing.
bible_in_chinese: 耶和華是我的牧者，我必不至缺乏。

bible_in_eng: Putting all your troubles on him, for he takes care of you.
bible_in_chinese: 你們要將一切的憂慮卸給神，因為他顧念你們。

bible_in_eng: I was searching for the Lord, and he gave ear to my voice, and made me free from all my fears.
bible_in_chinese: 我曾尋求耶和華，他就應允我，救我脫離了一切的恐懼。

bible_in_eng: The man whose heart is unmoved you will keep in peace, because his hope is in you.
bible_in_chinese: 堅心倚賴你的，你必保守他十分平安，因為他倚靠你。

bible_in_eng: In the world you have trouble: but take heart! I have overcome the world.
bible_in_chinese: 在世上，你們有苦難；但你們可以放心，我已經勝了世界。

bible_in_eng: Be at peace in the knowledge that I am God: I will be lifted up among the nations, I will be honoured through all the earth.
bible_in_chinese: 你們要休息，要知道我是神！我必在外邦中被尊崇，在遍地上也被尊崇。

bible_in_eng: When the cares of my heart are many, your consolations cheer my soul.
bible_in_chinese: 我心裡多憂多疑，你安慰我，就使我歡樂。

bible_in_eng: Take heart and be strong; have no fear and do not be troubled; for the Lord your God is with you wherever you go,
bible_in_chinese: 你當剛強壯膽！不要懼怕，也不要驚惶；因為你無論往哪裡去，耶和華－你的神必與你同在。

bible_in_eng: But those who are waiting for the Lord will have new strength; they will get wings like eagles: running, they will not be tired, and walking, they will have no weariness.
bible_in_chinese: 但那等候耶和華的必從新得力。他們必如鷹展翅上騰；他們奔跑卻不困倦，行走卻不疲乏。

bible_in_eng: I am able to do all things through him who gives me strength.
bible_in_chinese: 我靠著那加給我力量的，凡事都能做。

bible_in_eng: For God did not give us a spirit of fear, but of power and of love and of self-control.
bible_in_chinese: 因為神賜給我們，不是膽怯的心，乃是剛強、仁愛、謹守的心。

bible_in_eng: Lastly, be strong in the Lord, and in the strength of his power.
bible_in_chinese: 你們要靠著主，倚賴他的大能大力作剛強的人。

bible_in_eng: The Lord is my rock, my fortress and my saviour;
bible_in_chinese: 耶和華是我的岩石，我的山寨，我的救主，我的神。

bible_in_eng: The Lord will fight for you; you need only to be still.
bible_in_chinese: 耶和華必為你們爭戰；你們只管靜默，不要作聲。

bible_in_eng: So do not fear, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God. I will strengthen you and help you; I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.
bible_in_chinese: 你不要害怕，因為我與你同在；不要驚惶，因為我是你的神。我必堅固你，我必幫助你。

bible_in_eng: The Lord is my light and my salvation; whom shall I fear? The Lord is the stronghold of my life; of whom shall I be afraid?
bible_in_chinese: 耶和華是我的亮光，是我的拯救，我還怕誰呢？

bible_in_eng: But he said to me, 'My grace is sufficient for you, for my power is made perfect in weakness.'
bible_in_chinese: 他對我說：『我的恩典夠你用的，因為我的能力是在人的軟弱上顯得完全。』

bible_in_eng: This is the word of the LORD to Zerubbabel: Not by might, nor by power, but by my Spirit, says the LORD of hosts.
bible_in_chinese: 不是倚靠勢力，不是倚靠才能，乃是倚靠我的靈方能成事。

bible_in_eng: Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid or terrified because of them, for the Lord your God goes with you; he will never leave you nor forsake you.
bible_in_chinese: 你們當剛強壯膽，不要害怕，也不要畏懼他們，因為耶和華你的神和你同去。他必不撇下你，也不丟棄你。

bible_in_eng: The Lord is my strength and my shield; in him my heart trusts in him, and he helps me.
bible_in_chinese: 耶和華是我的力量，是我的盾牌；我心裡倚靠他就得幫助。

bible_in_eng: But we are able to overcome all these things and more through his love.
bible_in_chinese: 然而，靠著愛我們的主，在一切的事上已經得勝有餘了。

bible_in_eng: The LORD is on my side; I will not fear. What can man do to me?
bible_in_chinese: 有耶和華幫助我，我必不懼怕，人能把我怎麼樣呢？

bible_in_eng: Love is patient and kind; love does not envy or boast; it is not arrogant
bible_in_chinese: 愛是恆久忍耐，又有恩慈；愛是不嫉妒；愛是不自誇，不張狂……凡事包容，凡事相信，凡事盼望，凡事忍耐。

bible_in_eng: We love because he first loved us.
bible_in_chinese: 我們愛，因為神先愛我們。

bible_in_eng: My command is this: Love each other as I have loved you.
bible_in_chinese: 你們要彼此相愛，像我愛你們一樣；這就是我的命令。

bible_in_eng: My little children, do not let our love be in word and in tongue, but let it be in act and in good faith.
bible_in_chinese: 小子們哪，我們相愛，不要只在言語和舌頭上，總要在行為和誠實上。

bible_in_eng: And more than all, have love; the only way in which you may be completely joined together.
bible_in_chinese: 在這一切之外，要存著愛心，愛心就是聯絡全德的。

bible_in_eng: And most of all, be warm in your love for one another; because in love there is forgiveness for sins without number.
bible_in_chinese: 最要緊的是彼此切實相愛，因為愛能遮掩許多的罪。

bible_in_eng: For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life.
bible_in_chinese: 神愛世人，甚至將他的獨生子賜給他們，叫一切信他的，不至滅亡，反得永生。

bible_in_eng: He has told you, O man, what is good; and what does the LORD require of you but to do justice, and to love kindness, and to walk humbly with your God?
bible_in_chinese: 只要你行公義，好憐憫，存謙卑的心，與你的神同行。

bible_in_eng: A friend is loving at all times, and becomes a brother in times of trouble.
bible_in_chinese: 朋友乃時常親愛，弟兄為患難而生。

bible_in_eng: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, forbearance, kindness, goodness, faithfulness, gentleness and self-control.
bible_in_chinese: 聖靈所結的果子，就是仁愛、喜樂、和平、忍耐、恩慈、良善、信實、溫柔、節制。

bible_in_eng: A new command I give you: Love one another: just as I have loved you, you also are to love one another.
bible_in_chinese: 我賜給你們一條新命令，乃是叫你們彼此相愛。

bible_in_eng: Go on loving your brothers in the faith.
bible_in_chinese: 你們務要常存弟兄相愛的心。

bible_in_eng: Hate is a cause of violent acts, but all errors are covered up by love.
bible_in_chinese: 恨能挑啟爭端；愛能遮掩一切過錯。

bible_in_eng: Beloved, let us love one another, for love is from God, and whoever loves has been born of God and knows God.
bible_in_chinese: 親愛的弟兄啊，我們應當彼此相愛，因為愛是從神來的。

bible_in_eng: Being gentle to one another and having forgiveness for one another, if anyone has done wrong to his brother, even as the Lord had forgiveness for you:
bible_in_chinese: 倘若這人與那人有嫌隙，總要彼此包容，彼此饒恕。

bible_in_eng: Trust in the LORD with all your heart, and do not lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make straight your paths.
bible_in_chinese: 你要專心仰賴耶和華，不可倚靠自己的聰明，在你一切所行的事上都要認定他，他必指引你的路。

bible_in_eng: Now faith is the assurance of things hoped for, the conviction of things not seen.
bible_in_chinese: 信就是所望之事的實底，是未見之事造的確據。

bible_in_eng: And we know that for those who love God all things work together for good, for those who are called according to his purpose.
bible_in_chinese: 我們曉得萬事都互相效力，叫愛神的人得益處。

bible_in_eng: For I know the plans I have for you,” declares the Lord, “plans to prosper you and not to harm you, plans to give you a hope and a future.
bible_in_chinese: 耶和華說：我知道我向你們所懷的意念是賜平安的意念，不是降災禍的意念，要叫你們末後有指望。

bible_in_eng: Your word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.
bible_in_chinese: 你的話是我腳前的燈，是我路上的光。

bible_in_eng: But seek first his kingdom and his righteousness, and all these things will be given to you as well.
bible_in_chinese: 你們要先求他的國和他的義，這些東西都要加給你們了。

bible_in_eng: Do not be conformed to this world, but be transformed by the renewal of your mind, that by testing you may discern what is the will of God, what is good and acceptable and perfect.
bible_in_chinese: 不要效法這個世界，只要心意更新而變化，叫你們察驗何為神的善良、純全、可喜悅的旨意。

bible_in_eng: If any of you lacks wisdom, let him ask God, who gives generously to all without an unkind word, and it will be given to him.
bible_in_chinese: 你們中間若有缺少智慧的，應當求那厚賜與眾人、也不斥責人的神，主就必賜給他。

bible_in_eng: Put your works into the hands of the Lord, and your purposes will be made certain.
bible_in_chinese: 你所做的，要交託耶和華，你所謀的，就必成立。

bible_in_eng: 'If you can?' said Jesus. 'Everything is possible for one who believes.'
bible_in_chinese: 在信的人，凡事都能。

bible_in_eng: Guard your heart, for everything you do flows from it.
bible_in_chinese: 你要保守你心，勝過保守一切，因為一生的果效是由心發出。

bible_in_eng: let every person be quick to hear, slow to speak, slow to anger;
bible_in_chinese: 你們各人要快快的聽，慢慢的說，慢慢的動怒。

bible_in_eng: Delight yourself in the Lord, and he will give you the desires of your heart.
bible_in_chinese: 又要以耶和華為樂，他就將你心裡所求的賜給你。

bible_in_eng: The fear of the Lord is the start of knowledge: but the foolish have no use for wisdom and teaching.
bible_in_chinese: 敬畏耶和華是知識的開端；愚妄人藐視智慧和訓誨。

bible_in_eng: Now to him who is able to do in full measure more than all our desires or thoughts, through the power which is working in us,
bible_in_chinese: 神能照著運行在我們心裡的大大力充充足足地成就一切，超過我們所求所想的。

bible_in_eng: Put your life in the hands of the Lord; have faith in him and he will do it.
bible_in_chinese: 當將你的事交託耶和華，並倚靠他，他就必成全。

bible_in_eng: For we are walking by faith, not by seeing,
bible_in_chinese: 因我們行事為人是憑著信心，不是憑著眼見。

bible_in_eng: Many are the plans in the mind of a man, but it is the purpose of the LORD that will stand.
bible_in_chinese: 人心多有計謀；惟有耶和華的籌算才能立定。

bible_in_eng: Make me to know your ways, O Lord; teach me your paths.
bible_in_chinese: 求你將你的道指示我，將你的路教訓我！

bible_in_eng: For everything there is a season, and a time for every matter under heaven:
bible_in_chinese: 凡事都有定期，天下萬務都有定時。

bible_in_eng: It is through the Lord's love that we have not come to destruction, because his mercies have no limit.
bible_in_chinese: 我們不至消滅，是出於耶和華諸般的慈愛；是因他的憐憫不至斷絕。每早晨，這都是新的。

bible_in_eng: May the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace in believing, so that by the power of Holy Spirit you may overflow with hope .
bible_in_chinese: 但願使人有盼望的神，因信將諸般的喜樂、平安充滿你們的心，使你們藉著聖靈的能力大有盼望！

bible_in_eng: For his anger lasts only a moment, but his favor lasts a lifetime; weeping may stay for the night, but rejoicing comes in the morning.
bible_in_chinese: 一宿雖然有哭泣，早晨便必歡呼。

bible_in_eng: In the same way, let your light shine before others, so that they may see your good works and give glory to your Father in heaven.
bible_in_chinese: 你們的光也當這樣照在人前，叫他們看見你們的好行為，便將榮耀歸給你們在天上的父。

bible_in_eng: I lift up my eyes to the mountains. From where does my help come from? My help comes from the Lord, who made heaven and earth.
bible_in_chinese: 我要向山舉目；我的幫助從何而來？我的幫助從造天地的耶和華而來。

bible_in_eng: If God is for us, who can be against us?
bible_in_chinese: 神若幫助我們，誰能敵擋我們呢？

bible_in_eng: The Lord your God is among you, as a strong saviour: he will be glad over you with joy, he will make his love new again, he will make a song of joy over you as in the time of a holy feast.
bible_in_chinese: 耶和華—你的神在你中間大有能力，主必施行拯救……他在愛中靜默，且因你歡欣歌唱。

bible_in_eng: And I am sure of this, that he who began a good work in you will bring it to completion at the day of Jesus Christ.
bible_in_chinese: 我深信那在你們心裡動了善工的，必成全這工，直到耶穌基督的日子。

bible_in_eng: Let all you do be done in love.
bible_in_chinese: 凡你們所做的都要憑愛心而做。

bible_in_eng: The Lord bless you and keep you; the Lord make his face shine on you and be gracious to you; the Lord turn his face toward you and give you peace.
bible_in_chinese: 願耶和華賜福給你，保護你。願耶和華使他的臉光照你，賜恩給你。願耶和華向你仰臉，賜你平安。

bible_in_eng: But now, this is what the Lord says... Do not fear, for I have redeemed you; I have summoned you by name; you are mine.
bible_in_chinese: 你不要害怕！因為我救贖了你。我憑你的名召你，你是屬我的。

bible_in_eng: Being glad in hope, quiet in trouble, at all times given to prayer,
bible_in_chinese: 在指望中要喜樂，在患難中要忍耐，禱告要恆切。

bible_in_eng: Let us keep the witness of our hope strong and unshaking, for he is true who has given his word:
bible_in_chinese: 也要堅守我們所承認的指望，不至搖動，因為那應許我們的是信實的。

bible_in_eng: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.
bible_in_chinese: 他醫好傷心的人，裹好他們的傷處。

bible_in_eng: And let us not get tired of well-doing; for at the right time we will get in the grain, if we do not give up.
bible_in_chinese: 我們行善，不可喪志；若不灰心，到了時候就要收成。

bible_in_eng: Therefore encourage one another and build one another up, just as you are doing.
bible_in_chinese: 所以，你們該彼此勸慰，互相建立。

bible_in_eng: Be strong and let your heart take courage, all you who hope in the Lord.
bible_in_chinese: 凡仰望耶和華的人，你們都要剛強，堅固你們的心！

bible_in_eng: For the mountains may be taken away, and the hills be moved out of their places, but my love will not be taken from you, or my agreement of peace broken, says the Lord, who has had mercy on you.
bible_in_chinese: 大山可以挪開，小山可以遷移；但我的慈愛必不離開你; 我平安的約也不遷移。這是憐恤你的耶和華說的。

bible_in_eng: Let noone look down on you because you are young, but set the believers an example in speech, in conduct, in love, in faith and in purity.
bible_in_chinese: 不可叫人小看你年輕，總要在言語、行為、愛心、信心、清潔上，都作信徒的榜樣。

bible_in_eng: ‘He will wipe every tear from their eyes and there will be no more death, or sorrow, or crying, or pain, for the former things have passed away.
bible_in_chinese: 神要擦去他們一切的眼淚；不再有死亡，也不再有悲哀、哭號、疼痛，因為以前的事都過去了。

bible_in_eng: For all have done wrong and are far from the glory of God;
bible_in_chinese: 因為世人都犯了罪，虧缺了神的榮耀。
category: Grace & Principles / 恩典與生活原則

bible_in_eng: For by grace you have been saved through faith. And this is not from yourselves; it is the gift of God, not a result of works, so that no one may take glory of him.
bible_in_chinese: 你們得救是本乎恩，也因著信；這並不是出於自己，乃是神所賜的；也不是出於行為，免得有人自誇。
category: Grace & Principles / 恩典與生活原則

bible_in_eng: For the reward of sin is death, but the free gift of God is eternal life in Christ Jesus our Lord.
bible_in_chinese: 因為罪的工價乃是死；惟有神的恩賜，在我們的主基督耶穌裡，乃是永生。
category: Grace & Principles / 恩典與生活原則

bible_in_eng: If we confess our sins, he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins and to purify us from all unrighteousness.
bible_in_chinese: 我們若認自己的罪，神是信實的，是公義的，必要赦免我們的罪，洗淨我們一切的不義。
category: Grace & Principles / 恩典與生活原則

bible_in_eng: Jesus said to him, 'I am the way and the truth and the life. No one comes to the Father except through me.'
bible_in_chinese: 耶穌說：我就是道路、真理、生命；若不藉著我，沒有人能到父那裡去。
category: Grace & Principles / 恩典與生活原則

bible_in_eng: Therefore, if anyone is in Christ, he is a new creation. The old has passed away; behold, the new has come.
bible_in_chinese: 若有人在基督裡，他就是新造的人，舊事已過，都變成新的了。
category: Grace & Principles / 恩典與生活原則

bible_in_eng: In all things I have shown you that by working hard in this way we must help the weak and remember the words of the Lord Jesus, how he himself said, ‘It is more blessed to give than to receive.
bible_in_chinese: 施比受更為有福。
category: Grace & Principles / 恩典與生活原則

bible_in_eng: Rejoice always, pray continually, give thanks in all circumstances; for this is God’s will for you in Christ Jesus.
bible_in_chinese: 要常常喜樂，不住地禱告，凡事謝恩；因為這是神在基督耶穌裡向你們所定的旨意。
category: Grace & Principles / 恩典與生活原則

bible_in_eng: Enter his gates with thanksgiving and his courts with praise! Give thanks to him and praise his name.
bible_in_chinese: 當稱謝進入他的門；當讚美進入他的院。當感謝他，稱頌他的名！
category: Grace & Principles / 恩典與生活原則

bible_in_eng: Jesus Christ is the same yesterday and today and forever.
bible_in_chinese: 耶穌基督昨日、今日、一直到永遠，是一樣的。
category: Grace & Principles / 恩典與生活原則

bible_in_eng: Do to others as you would have them do to you.
bible_in_chinese: 你們願意人怎樣待你們，你們也要怎樣待人。
category: Grace & Principles / 恩典與生活原則

bible_in_eng: This is the day that the LORD has made; let us rejoice and be glad in it.
bible_in_chinese: 這是耶和華所定的日子，我們在其中要高興歡喜！
category: Grace & Principles / 恩典與生活原則

bible_in_eng: Whatever you do, work at it with all your heart, as working for the Lord, not for men,
bible_in_chinese: 無論做什麼，都要從心裡做，像是給主做的，不是給人做的。
category: Grace & Principles / 恩典與生活原則

bible_in_eng: Ask and it will be given to you; seek; and you will find; knock and the door will be opened to you.
bible_in_chinese: 你們祈求，就給你們；尋找，就尋見；叩門，就給你們開門。
category: Grace & Principles / 恩典與生活原則

bible_in_eng: Therefore, I urge you, brothers and sisters, in view of God’s mercy, to offer your bodies as a living sacrifice, holy and pleasing to God — this is your true and proper worship.
bible_in_chinese: 將身體獻上，當作活祭，是聖潔的，是神所喜悅的。
category: Grace & Principles / 恩典與生活原則

bible_in_eng: Praise the Lord, my soul; and all that is within me, praise his holy name.
bible_in_chinese: 我的心哪，你要稱頌耶和華！凡在我裡面的，也要稱頌他的聖名！
category: Grace & Principles / 恩典與生活原則

bible_in_eng: But you are a chosen people, a holy nation, priests and kings, a people given up completely to God,
bible_in_chinese: 惟有你們是被揀選的族類，是有君尊的祭司，是聖潔的國度。
category: Grace & Principles / 恩典與生活原則

bible_in_eng: No temptation has overtaken you that is not common to man. God is faithful,and he will not let you be tempted beyond what you can bear.
bible_in_chinese: 神是信實的，必不叫你們受試探過於所能受的。
category: Grace & Principles / 恩典與生活原則

bible_in_eng: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations,  giving them baptism in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, ... I am with you always, to the end of the age.”
bible_in_chinese: 所以，你們要去，使萬民作我的門徒, 奉父、子、聖靈的名給他們施洗, ……我就常與你們同在，直到世界的末了。
category: Grace & Principles / 恩典與生活原則

bible_in_eng: To him who is able to keep you from falling, and to give you a place in his glory, free from all evil, with great joy,
bible_in_chinese: 那能保守你們不失腳、叫你們無瑕無疵、歡歡喜喜站在他榮耀之前的救主－獨一的神。
category: Grace & Principles / 恩典與生活原則
